programme.title: Renee Fleming, Christmas in New York (2014)
programme.desc: The essence of the city during the most wonderful time of year is captured in a series of intimate and unique musical performances on Christmas In New York. Filmed in 2014, American soprano Rene Fleming and special guests including Rufus Wainwright, Gregory Porter, Kelli OHara and Kurt Elling bring the iconic Christmas season in New York to homes around the world. Rene and her guests discuss family, food, tradition, their favourite Christmas songs and sing carols by the roaring fire.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Madeline thinks that Ah Hock is insensitive to her desire to have children. Ajay is upset when Cameron asks Kenneth to help him look after their newborn babies.

programme.title: The Christmas Contract
programme.desc: A recently-single woman dreads the thought of going back to her home town in Louisiana for Christmas when she finds out her ex-boyfriend will be there with his new girlfriend.

programme.title: Cirque Du Soleil: Kurios - Cabinet Of Curiosities
programme.desc: The incredible team at Cirque du Soleil invites viewers inside a larger-than-life curio cabinet, where a world of crazy ideas, grand dreams and otherworldly characters spring to life and engage imaginations.

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabets are S and T. Residents of Planets S and T needs lessons on exercising.

programme.title: The Rainbow Bus
programme.desc: The first adventure brings them to a Nature Reserve. Next they head to the Frog Farm to learn more about frogs! Lastly, the adventurers face some obstacle course at Forest Adventure!

programme.title: Zou S3
programme.desc: Join Zou the zebra and his family and friends for more daily adventures of discovery and exploration!

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S1
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure... and Gigantosaurus, the biggest, fiercest dinosaur, reigns over it all!

programme.title: Counting With Paula S6
programme.desc: The children are sent on a mission to take care of the lost and found counter. Astrid decides to find the item's owner but returns them wrongly to someone else. What happens when the actual owner returns and couldn't find their item? Mr Astronaut instructs the children not to touch a red button on the control panel of a spaceship but Tim couldn't resist causing them to get lost in space.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S8
programme.desc: The Ollie Squad officially moves into the Imp's Lair! Squabbles ensue as the gang learn to share their space. Meanwhile, Poly-GON's scheme threatens to arrive at their front door.

programme.title: My Little Pony Equestria Girls Special: Holiday Unwrapped
programme.desc: Six short stories at Canterlot High interwoven around the holiday season including a fake snow day, delivering a perfect souffle, out-swindling the Flim Flam, children's toys, a last minute gift exchange and themed photograph.

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series S23
programme.desc: When our heroes set off to investigate a rumor, finding a Legendary Pokemon becomes top priority!

programme.title: Agents Of Sprawl
programme.desc: Vicious rumours begin to circulate about UnyX and the team. Stephen Zero shows up to tell his side of the story, uncovering a hidden past between him and UnyX - one that she herself confesses to. So, is Stephen really the villain... or was it UnyX all along?

programme.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir S3
programme.desc: Marinette and Adrien's relationship finally takes a cautious step forward, but Kagami -- and the future of Paris -- stand in their way.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst S1
programme.desc: Just before a match, Ken is rattled by Xander and his powerful new technique, but after a pep talk from the team, he vows to put his fears behind him. Next it's Valt's turn to face Xander in a three-point match. Something seems to be wrong with Valtryek, despite Valt's determination to win.

programme.title: Rachel Allen's Cake Diaries
programme.desc: Cake is about so much more than the traditional celebrations we all recognise. It shouldn't be confined to birthdays and anniversaries. A great cake has a part to play in everyday life. In this super-stylish yet personal series, chef Rachel Allen flicks through her diary where a range of life events, from a big family occasion to something as simple as a change in the weather, inspires a cake to compliment the moment.

programme.title: Christmas In Love
programme.desc: Ellie Hartman, an aspiring crafter working in her small town's bakery shows Nick Carlingson, the big city new CEO during his visit to the bakery's main floor that it's people and not machines that make the business a success.

programme.title: Gwen Stefani: You Make It Feel Like Christmas
programme.desc: Gwen Stefani's "You Make It Feel Like Christmas" is a modern take on traditional Christmas specials. Featuring music performances and fun holiday-themed sketches, the program captures Stefani's infectious spirit and iconic style, and shares it with audiences around the world. Special guest appearances include Blake Shelton, a five-time winning coach on NBC's "The Voice" and a multi-award-winning country music superstar.

programme.title: Michael Buble's Christmas in the City (2021)
programme.desc: This will be Michael's first Christmas special since 2015's Michael Buble's Christmas in Hollywood and his sixth one overall. He's returned to TV to celebrate the 10th anniversary of his record-setting 2011 album, Christmas, so you can expect music from that project to take center stage, along with other Christmas favorites.

programme.title: Elf: Buddy's Musical Christmas
programme.desc: A musical, stop-motion adaptation of the well-known movie, Buddy, a human raised in the north pole, goes to New York to find his family.

programme.title: TotalEnergies BWF World Championships 2021 (Mens Singles Finals)
programme.desc: TotalEnergies BWF World Championships 2021 took place from 12 to 19 December 2021 at Palacio de los Deportes Carolina Marn in Huelva, Spain where Singaporean shuttler Loh Kean Yew stormed to victory after beating India's Kidambi Srikanth to win the men's singles title and become the first Singaporean to win a BWF World Championships title.

programme.title: The Prince of Egypt
programme.desc: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

programme.title: AFF Suzuki Cup 2020 - Semi Finals
programme.desc: (Live) The AFF Suzuki Cup is a biennial football competition organised by the ASEAN Football Federation (AFF), accredited by FIFA, and contested by the national A' teams of Southeast Asia. The 13th edition of the AFF Suzuki Cup, scheduled from 5 December 2021 to 1 January 2022, will continue the format where 10 qualified teams will be split into two groups of five and play a round robin system, with each team playing four fixtures.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Kelly Clarkson Presents: When Christmas Comes Around (2021)
programme.desc: Kelly Clarkson is bringing seasonal cheer this December with her holiday spectacular, Kelly Clarkson Presents: When Christmas Comes Around. Taking place at Universal Studios Hollywood, the stage will be designed to evoke timeless Christmas themes inspired by the power of song that change the viewers' point of view --- from fantastical worlds of being underneath the tree to a forest lit by the Northern Lights.

programme.desc: The Australian Ballets Artistic Director, David McAllister, has created a sumptuous new production of this timeless classic, with lavish sets and costumes by award-winning designer Gabriela Tylesova. Set to Tchaikovsky's sublime score, this enchanting production casts a spell of delight all the way to true loves kiss.

programme.title: Rachel Allen: All Things Sweet Christmas Special
programme.desc: This festive edition of Rachel Allen: All Things Sweet has the much-loved cook and broadcaster showcasing delicious recipes as well as passing on tips to help viewers create these treats themselves. Rachel shakes up the traditional dessert menu and serves up something a little different for the holiday season, with some exciting flavours and aromas to help viewers create a memorable Christmas. Dishes include festive fruity steamed pudding, mulled port pears with port jelly, etc.

programme.desc: Titipo meets Manny, the freight train, who is new to Train Village. After talking to him, Titipo thinks Manny is a brave and hearty train. Titipo goes back to Train Village and tells everyone what a great train he thinks Manny is. Hearing this, everyone is curious about Manny. However, Manny is completely different from how Titipo described him.

programme.desc: Peter takes the route less travelled through a region bursting with cultural diversity. Through heartfelt interactions with local families, Peter experiences the spirit of each community's rich culture and learns the secrets of their unique cuisines. Then he brings it all home to Noosa to experience a truly Australian Christmas.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2

Every week, a super villain from their past resurfaces, and it's up to our superheroes with no super powers to foil them.

programme.title: 食分绝配
programme.desc: 五味之首的酸清新且能提味、解腻，但是过多了的刺激性会令人招架不住。这次的风味搭配探索将看到利用两种不同的醋来烹煮的猪脚醋、以罗望子调味的越南酸甜虾和富有娘惹风味的咸菜鸭汤。杨应晖从它们当中找出酸味与各种味道复合的奥妙之处 – 酸甜、酸辣、苦酸等风味，并启发他颠覆传统的潮州菜肴，烹煮出一道干式的咸菜鸭汤.

programme.title: 香港原味道 （第四辑）
programme.desc: 《香港原味道》新四辑，谭玉瑛第四次领军，带着黄庭锋、孔德贤、林正峰继续追味寻源，从香港农田、鱼排，见证本地农业、渔业的发展。深入土炮食材的产地，寻找真正来自本港或香港制造的优质食材。每集深入认识一种地道食材，走进本土鱼场、鲜果园、鲜菜园、水耕菜工场、食品厂、酱油厂等等，发掘更多本地饮食智慧，品尝每一口新鲜美味，探索每一种港产食材背后的故事.

programme.desc: (重) 这一季的《打工捱世界》，袁伟豪（Ben）和杨明（阿杨）将从游客看不到的角度认识非洲坦桑尼亚和意大利威尼斯。非洲坦桑尼亚并非一个富裕国家，他们在当地打工后有什么体验，又是否会感到富足？ 在「旅游天堂」意大利威尼斯打工依旧是要从低做起！担任渔民，天还没亮便要开工，辛劳而不浪漫。二人还要出卖劳力送货、街头卖艺，又担当餐厅侍应生招呼客人，吸取不一样的工作体验.

programme.title: 与神的约定
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 显祐接受骨髓移植后出现排斥反应，陷入昏迷。娜京听说后，心虚又内疚，于是到医院找智英，说不需要智英交出显祐.

programme.title: VIP
programme.desc: (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 美娜晕倒在办公室，贞善与玄雅急忙送她去医疗室，大家这才知她怀孕了。贞善也因此消除美娜是介入自己和盛俊婚姻的小三之误会。.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 太阳和志敏来到农场，谈天说地。太阳在志敏的要求下，留下来看星星，和诗月三人烤肉野餐.

programme.title: 太阳的季节
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 月天等人顺利收购阳地建设，开心不已。但收购后，公司股价立刻下跌。诗月认为这是太阳设下的陷阱，目的是要找她报仇.

programme.title: 边缘儿童
programme.desc: 在崇尚自由的香港，住了一群为自由流亡的人。但香港政府不曾签署“联合国难民公约”，无责任收留难民。而难民在这里申请合法难民认证的手续十分繁复，许多人一等就是十多年， 当中不少在香港有了下一代。这群身份尴尬的异国小孩，在努力尝试融入香港的生活的同时，随时准备着他们的世界将因“难民资格”遭否决而彻底瓦解.

programme.title: 优雅的家
programme.desc: (PG)(双声道-中/韩) 允道查到了娜莉和完秀曾交往过的证据，却刻意隐瞒，不想拿给帝菊。帝菊改找权俊赫查出真相，后以隐瞒哲熙来威胁娜莉去国外生活作交换条件。英书要帝菊把娜莉和瑞振送去寮国生活。.
